title: Fully wired and connected for your digital lifestyle
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 695 Sq.

A stroll from your front door takes you to local eateries, eclectic shops, a playhouse, neighborhood pubs, grocery stores, and a favorite old school European deli that has become a West Seattle landmark.
There is no set art design—this is a taste of daily life on the Westside, and here you get to sketch your lifestyle.
We are closer than you think: just a 12-minute bus ride from downtown lands you in the Alaska Junction, the heart of West Seattle.

Surrounded by views of Elliott Bay, the Olympic Mountains and the striking Seattle skyline, Mural celebrates the art of living—where environmental responsibility, functional design, and creativity all call home.
Visit our Seattle apartment community today.
- Conquer cold mornings with private underground parking
- Organize in fashion ready oversized closets
- Fully wired and connected for your digital lifestyle
- Set it to spin with a full size washer and dryer
- Expansive windows for maximum natural lighting
- Spacious one, and two bedroom floor plans
- Season & sauté in a gourmet kitchen
- Contemplate in the glow of the outdoor Fire Pit
- Reduce, Reuse, Recycle, and Live Green
- Reserve an elevator to make moving the big stuff a cinch.
- Host a private party in the Clubhouse
- Stay connected in the Internet Café with Wi-Fi hotspot
- Munch and mingle at a resident event, or grab a coffee on the go
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
